metadata.Title: CVE-2019-0203 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Apache Subversion versions up to and including 1.9.10, 1.10.4, 1.12.0,Subversion's svnserve server process may exit when a client sends certainsequences of protocol commands. This can lead to disruption for users ofthe server.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-0203` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-svn - 1.9.3-2ubuntu1.3
libapache2-svn - 1.9.3-2ubuntu1.3
libsvn-java - 1.9.3-2ubuntu1.3
libsvn-perl - 1.9.3-2ubuntu1.3
libsvn-ruby1.8 - 1.9.3-2ubuntu1.3
libsvn1 - 1.9.3-2ubuntu1.3
python-subversion - 1.9.3-2ubuntu1.3
ruby-svn - 1.9.3-2ubuntu1.3
subversion - 1.9.3-2ubuntu1.3
subversion-tools - 1.9.3-2ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: subversion package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.3-2ubuntu1.3').
